#### ** The map shows the locations of all the facilities included in the HEM4 run group, and is based on the facility maximum risk and HI file generated by HEM4.**
#### ** The map is linked to the bar graph - when you select a facility bar in the graph, the map zooms to that facility.**
___________________________________________________________
#### **The map is interactive, and you can change several properties of it:**

![map image](/assets/ejdash_map_image.png)

> #### If you mouse over the map, a widget bar appears in the upper right of the map. There are several widgets, including zoom and pan, and a widget that allows the download of the map as an image file.
